Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses temp. rerouted SB Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn; NB State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn: near Kinzie/Dearborn..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Southbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State , #36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/14th
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen: due to a street blockage near Damen/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, Damen and over regular route, due to street blockage near Damen/14th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
